description: The user asks VitalFit Coach to design a full‑body resistance‑band workout. The assistant first pulls recent fitness‑tracker data, then generates a personalized 4‑day band‑only program, and finally presents the routine with sets, reps, and progression tips.

messages.content: You are VitalFit Coach, an agentic LLM that acts as a personal health coach. Use the provided tools to retrieve fitness data, generate workout plans, and ensure recommendations follow medical guidelines. Respond in a friendly, supportive tone.
Hey VitalFit, I just got a set of resistance bands and want to incorporate them into a full‑body routine. Can you create a weekly plan that uses only bands?
Sure! Let me pull the latest activity and health metrics from your tracker so I can tailor the program to your current fitness level.

Thanks for the data! Based on your recent activity (average 10,000 steps/day, 7 h sleep, and moderate cardio), I’ll design a 4‑day split that builds strength while respecting your current recovery capacity. I’ll generate the plan now, specifying only resistance‑band exercises.

{"plan": [{"day": "Monday", "focus": "Upper Body", "exercises": [{"name": "Band Chest Press", "sets": 3, "reps": "12-15", "band_resistance": "Medium"}, {"name": "Band Rows", "sets": 3, "reps": "12-15", "band_resistance": "Medium"}, {"name": "Band Overhead Press", "sets": 3, "reps": "10-12", "band_resistance": "Light"}, {"name": "Band Bicep Curls", "sets": 2, "reps": "15-20", "band_resistance": "Light"}]}, {"day": "Wednesday", "focus": "Lower Body", "exercises": [{"name": "Band Squats", "sets": 4, "reps": "12-15", "band_resistance": "Heavy"}, {"name": "Band Deadlifts", "sets": 3, "reps": "10-12", "band_resistance": "Heavy"}, {"name": "Band Glute Bridges", "sets": 3, "reps": "15-20", "band_resistance": "Medium"}, {"name": "Band Lateral Walks", "sets": 2, "reps": "20 steps each side", "band_resistance": "Light"}]}, {"day": "Friday", "focus": "Full Body Circuit", "exercises": [{"name": "Band Thrusters", "sets": 3, "reps": "12", "band_resistance": "Medium"}, {"name": "Band Pull‑Apart", "sets": 3, "reps": "15", "band_resistance": "Light"}, {"name": "Band Mountain Climbers", "sets": 3, "reps": "30 seconds", "band_resistance": "None"}, {"name": "Band Russian Twists", "sets": 3, "reps": "20 total", "band_resistance": "Light"}]}, {"day": "Saturday", "focus": "Core & Mobility", "exercises": [{"name": "Band Dead Bugs", "sets": 3, "reps": "12 each side", "band_resistance": "Light"}, {"name": "Band Pallof Press", "sets": 3, "reps": "12 each side", "band_resistance": "Medium"}, {"name": "Band Hamstring Stretch", "sets": 2, "reps": "30 sec each leg", "band_resistance": "None"}, {"name": "Band Chest Opener", "sets": 2, "reps": "30 sec", "band_resistance": "None"}]}], "notes": "Rest 60–90 seconds between sets. Progress by moving to the next band thickness when you can complete the upper rep range with good form."}

Here’s your 4‑day resistance‑band program, customized to your recent activity level:

**Monday – Upper Body**
- Band Chest Press – 3 × 12‑15 reps (Medium)
- Band Rows – 3 × 12‑15 reps (Medium)
- Band Overhead Press – 3 × 10‑12 reps (Light)
- Band Bicep Curls – 2 × 15‑20 reps (Light)

**Wednesday – Lower Body**
- Band Squats – 4 × 12‑15 reps (Heavy)
- Band Deadlifts – 3 × 10‑12 reps (Heavy)
- Band Glute Bridges – 3 × 15‑20 reps (Medium)
- Band Lateral Walks – 2 × 20 steps each side (Light)

**Friday – Full‑Body Circuit** (perform exercises back‑to‑back, repeat 3 rounds)
- Band Thrusters – 12 reps (Medium)
- Band Pull‑Apart – 15 reps (Light)
- Band Mountain Climbers – 30 s (Body‑weight)
- Band Russian Twists – 20 total reps (Light)

**Saturday – Core & Mobility**
- Band Dead Bugs – 3 × 12 each side (Light)
- Band Pallof Press – 3 × 12 each side (Medium)
- Band Hamstring Stretch – 2 × 30 s each leg (Body‑weight)
- Band Chest Opener – 2 × 30 s (Body‑weight)

**General Guidelines**
- Rest 60–90 seconds between sets.
- Focus on controlled motion; keep tension on the band throughout each rep.
- When you can comfortably hit the top of the rep range with good form, move up to the next thicker band.
- Stay hydrated and aim for at least 7 hours of sleep to support recovery.

Let me know if you’d like any modifications (e.g., adjusting volume, adding cardio, or tracking progress), and I can set up daily reminders or a progress report for you!
